      • Zombie

        public Zombie​(int health,
              int maxHealth,
              int damage,
              int defense,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.util.ArrayList inventory,
              Weapon weapon,
              Armor armor)
        The constructor for loading the Zombie from the save file. Contains all information necessary to recreate it from where the player left off.
        Parameters:
        health - Current health
        maxHealth - Max health
        damage - Base damage
        defense - Base defense
        name - Name
        inventory - Zombie's inventory
        weapon - Zombie's equipped weapon
        armor - Zombie's equipped armor
